com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.api

Interface IScriptCreationApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDynamicObjectAware
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IScriptCreationApiWithFields

    @DynamicTarget(value={"com.vector.cfg.automation.scripting.base.IScriptExecutionContext","com.vector.cfg.automation.api.ScriptTaskTypeApi"})
 @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface IScriptCreationApi
extends IDynamicObjectAware
    IScriptCreationApi is the main interface to create new IScriptTasks inside of an IScript. The class provides methods to create IScriptTasks for all IScriptTaskType.

    Groovy: An instance of IScriptCreationApi is automatically activated in every groovy script, and set as an delegate.

    Java: Java client have to use the IScriptFactory to get an instance of a IScriptCreationApi

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    See Also:
    IScriptTaskType.IProjectScriptTaskType, IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType, IScriptFactory

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder
      The IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder provides the methods callable during creation of an IScriptTask with IScriptTaskType is an application type.
      static interface  IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder
      The IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder provides the methods callable during creation of an IScriptTask with IScriptTaskType is bound to a project.
      static interface  IScriptCreationApi.IScriptExecutionContextWithNotExecutableReasons
      The Interface IScriptExecutionContextWithNotExecutableReasons combines IScriptExecutionContext and INotExecutableReasonBuilder.INotExecutableReasonBuilderProvider.
      static interface  IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder
      The IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder provides the methods callable during creation of an IScriptTask.

    • Method Detail

      • getScriptCreationApi

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi getScriptCreationApi()
        Returns this IScriptCreationApi.
        Returns:
        the creation API.

      • scriptDescription

        @PublishedMethod
void scriptDescription(java.lang.String scriptDescription)
        Sets the description of the script.
        Script Description
        The script can have an optional description text. The description shall list what this script contains. The method scriptDescription(String) sets the description of the script.

        The description shall be a short overview. The String can be multiline.

        Parameters:
        scriptDescription - the description text for the script

      • scriptTask

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder scriptTask(java.lang.String taskName,
                                                                   @VDelegatesToWithClosureParam(value=IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder.class)
                                                                   groovy.lang.Closure<?> task)
        Creates a new script task with the name taskName.
        To create a script task you have to call one of the scriptTask() methods. The last parameter of the scriptTask methods can be used to set additional options of the task. Every script task needs one IScriptTaskType.

        The code{ } block is required for every IScriptTask. The block contains the code, which is executed when the task is executed.

        Script Task with default Type

        The method scriptTask() will create an script task for the default IScriptTaskType DV_PROJECT.

        Parameters:
        taskName - the task name
        task - the task creation code. The Closure delegates to IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder
        Returns:
        the IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder of the created task.
        See Also:
        IScriptCreationApi.IProjectScriptTaskBuilder, IScriptTaskType

      • scriptTask

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder scriptTask(java.lang.String taskName,
                                                                   IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType taskType,
                                                                   @VDelegatesToWithClosureParam(value=IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder.class)
                                                                   groovy.lang.Closure<?> task)
        Creates a new script task with the name taskName.
        Script Task with Task Type
        You could also define the used IScriptTaskType at the scriptTask() methods. The methods
        • #scriptTask(String, IApplicationScriptTaskType, Closure)
        • #scriptTask(String, IProjectScriptTaskType, Closure)
        will create an script task for passed IScriptTaskType. The two methods differentiate, if a project is required or not.
        Parameters:
        taskName - the task name
        taskType - the IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType
        task - the task creation code. The Closure delegates to IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder
        Returns:
        the IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder of the created task.
        See Also:
        IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder, IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType

      • scriptTask

        @PublishedMethod
IScriptCreationApi.IScriptTaskBuilder scriptTask(java.lang.String taskName,
                                                                   IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType taskType,
                                                                   java.util.function.Consumer<IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder> task)
        Creates a new script task with the name taskName. The method uses an IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType. See #scriptTask(String, IApplicationScriptTaskType, Closure) for usage details.

        This method is mainly for Java clients.

        Parameters:
        taskName - the task name
        taskType - the IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType
        task - the task creation code. The Consumer passes the IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder
        Returns:
        the IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder of the created task.
        See Also:
        IScriptCreationApi.IApplicationScriptTaskBuilder, IScriptTaskType.IApplicationScriptTaskType

      • unitTestTask

        @PublishedMethod
void unitTestTask(java.lang.String taskName,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> unitTestClass)
        Adds a unit test task to the script.

        The added unit test (unitTestClass) could be one of:

        • JUnit test class
        • JUnit test suite
        • Spock Specification
        Parameters:
        taskName - the task name
        unitTestClass - the unit test class to execute
